```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

### Base R

```{r base-knitr}
head(iris)
```

### With huxtable

```{r knitr-huxtable}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(huxtable))
head(iris)
```

### Turning it off

```{r knitr-no-huxtable}
options(huxtable.knit_print_df = FALSE)
head(iris)
```

### Alternatives

#### printr

```{r printr}
library(printr)
head(iris)
```
